title: Marketplace Roundtable #17: Elazar Advisors' Winning Tech Formula
description: Earnings drives stocks; that's the fundamental thesis behind Chaim Siegel's approach to the market. Writing as Elazar Advisors, LLC, he has brought his experience in the markets - including at Morgan Stanley and S.A.C. Capital - to Nail Tech Earnings. He discusses his background and how he approaches the tech sector, and then shares his views on Twitter and Micron, among other ideas.
itunes:title: Elazar Advisors' Winning Tech Formula
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Elazar Advisors shares his tech investing approach and his views on the sector currently.
